comments:
Giving just program name, without full path, causes the following exception when
trying to invoke the Run launch config.  (Probably the other launchers have the
same problem.)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
MESSAGE Error logged from Debug UI: 
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException[5013]: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.cpp.ui.internal.launchers.CppRunLaunchConfigurationDelegate.launch(CppRunLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:43)
	at

	at

	at
org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:98)
!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.ui 4 5013 5/21/02 4:20 PM
!MESSAGE Exception occurred while launching
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.cpp.ui.internal.launchers.CppRunLaunchConfigurationDelegate.launch(CppRunLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:43)
	at

continue.
